metadata.title: CVE-2014-1937 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Gamera before 3.4.1 insecurely creates temporary files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1937` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gamera-gui - 3.4.2+svn1437-2
python-gamera - 3.4.2+svn1437-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gamera package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2+svn1437-2').
